Label.name: $(parent)Icon4Label
Label.text: Known by some and not you

Button.name: $(parent)FillSlots
Button.OnMouseEnter: ZO_Tooltips_ShowTextTooltip(self, TOP, 'Fill all empty research slots for each character known by any other with the line/trait that will require less time')

Button.name: $(parent)FillMySlots
Button.OnMouseEnter: ZO_Tooltips_ShowTextTooltip(self, TOP, 'Fill all empty research slots for CURRENT character known by the any character with the line/trait that will require less time')

Button.name: $(parent)FillKnownSlots
Button.OnMouseEnter: ZO_Tooltips_ShowTextTooltip(self, TOP, 'Fill all empty research slots for each character known ONLY by the current character with the line/trait that will require less time')

Label.name: $(parent)Item
Label.OnMouseEnter: InitializeTooltip(ItemTooltip, self) ItemTooltip:SetLink(self:GetText()) ItemTooltip:AddLine(zo_iconTextFormat("esoui/art/icons/icon_rmb.dds", 26, 26, "Remove from Queue"), "ZoFontGame", 1, 1, 1, LEFT, MODIFY_TEXT_TYPE_NONE, TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER, true)
